statement.p: A certain bread recipe asks you to combine yeast and flour with 4 cups of warm 120 째F water. If the water is hotter or colder than that, then the bread won't rise.
All you have available are water from your instant hot water dispenser that is 200 째F and ice that is 32 째F.
How much water from your instant hot water dispenser and ice should you mix together to get 4 cups of 120 째F water?
cups of water from your instant hot water dispenser.

p.em: Round your answers to 2 decimal places.
